tgt_original: kirīṭi triśikhaṃ caiva mukuṭaṃ khaṇḍameva ca ||33 ||  teṣāmaṣṭāṅgulaṃ dīrghaṃ kartavyaṃ nādhikaṃ tataḥ |

src_original: kaṇṭhastribalibhiryuktaḥ karttavyaḥ kambuvat sadā /  unnataḥ pṛṣṭhabhāga syāt parimaṇḍalasaṃyutaḥ // NCit_3.40 //  pañcāṅgulaṃ tu gaṇḍodhvaṃ adhaḥ syāt caturaṅgulam /  civukasya tathā mānaṃ caturaṅgulakaṃ matam // NCit_3.41 //  āyāmo mukhagāgasya tathauṣṭhasya vivarṇitaḥ /
tgt_original: mukhātā(khadvā)  raṃ pravakṣyāmi śubhaṃ vā yadi vā'śubham ||34 ||

src_original: caturasraṃ mukhaṃ pūrṇaṃ prasannaṃ cārulakṣaṇam // NCit_3.42 //

susampanno bhaviṣyati nara iha ca sarvadā // NCit_3.44 //  śāntikāmi mukhaṃ yat syād dīrghaṃ khartaṃ ca vartulam /  trikoṇaṃ vā prajānāñca sāmānyānāṃ bhaviṣyati // NCit_3.45 //  taditarañca yad bhavet pūrvalakṣaṇasaṃyutaṃ /  tad vijñeyaṃ ca devānāṃ mukhasya mānamīdṛśam // NCit_3.46 //

avikṣiptena gṛhyatāṃ manasā ca mahipate // NCit_3.47 //  yat sthānaṃ kaṭideśasya udarasya tathāntarā /  jñeyaṃ tad dvyaṅgulaṃ nūnaṃ skandhāyāmaḥ ṣaḍaṅgulaḥ /  daighrye tvaṣṭāṅgulo jñeyo vakṣastu dviguṇaṃ smṛtam // NCit_3.48 //  ārohaḥ syāttu meṭrasya ṣaḍaṅgulapramāṇakaḥ /  aṣṭādaśāṅgulā śroṇī ārohe kathitā budhaiḥ // NCit_3.49 //

jatruto hṛdayaṃ yāvan na kuṭilaḥ pradeśakaḥ /  hṛdayān nābhirandhrakaḥ bandhuraḥ syānna saṃśayaḥ /  nābhito meṭraparyantaṃ samānaṃ ca bhaved dhruvam // NCit_3.50 //  caturdaśāṅgulaṃ kaṭyā nābherardhāṅgulaṃ matam /
tgt_original: hikkācūcukayormadhye cūcukāntarameva ca ||37 ||  grīvāpārśvāt bhujāśīrṣaṃ tālamekaṃ prakīrtitam |  nābhicūcukayormadhye bhāgaścaturdaśāṅgulam ||38 ||  samasūtraṃ ca kartavyaṃ hikkā cāṃsāgrameva ca |
